data.text:
I think the enhancements would still seem relevant. Unsure if EH2 is really an issue still and Email addresses in EH8 to be updated. 

Then if not added as enhancement request already, I would add: 
-  To have an option to add / select search types and Reference field (if compulsory) on branch level.
-  And when creating a user (if not covered in EH04): SW should be automatically assigned, since most users do not navigate to Applications tab to assign SW; have an option to add search types; Default Deeds Office and select if reference is compulsory (if required).  
Shaun / Hariette should perhaps also comment.
